scenario_text.value:
I’m going to save all of you, okay?! Just you
wait and see!

Look at all those kids around Miu. She sure
is popular.

(They’re all crying as they say goodbye.
Clearly they know how Miu feels about them.)

I’m your queen, after all! Saving you is my
job!
Oh, Takuma!

Don’t mind me! Take your time and say
goodbye.

I will. Oh, but I want you to promise me one
thing.

You do? I mean, sure, as long as it’s
something I can do.
Don’t tell my brother I was crying, okay?
If he knew how much this made me cry...
...he’d probably try and make me stay here.
(Kaito’d leave her behind, huh?)
You think so?
Keep it a secret.
Maybe you should stay?
You think so?
Ha! This is Kaito we’re talking about?
“I’m doing this fer youuu, Miuuu,” he’d go.
Oh, well that does sound like him.
(Yep, it’s not hard to imagine.)
We’ll keep it a secret from Kaito, of course.
Heheh, thanks, Takuma!

If you hate leaving them so much, why not
stay behind?
T-Takuma! Why would you say that?!

Leaving her all by her lonesome is just too
cruel, you meanie!
Sorry, sorry sorry! That wasn’t what I meant!

I want to help save this world with everybody
else! I want to stay with you to the end!
Please, Takuma, will you promise me?

Sure, if it means that much to you. Besides,
I’ve always thought you should come with us.

Good! Now, I’m going to do my best to act
like a queen!

I’ll do whatever I can to let these kiddies
live in peace and happiness!
